text: Henry VI, Pt. 3 is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a history play. Shakespeare's source was Holinshed's Chronicles. The play was first performed between 1592 and 1593. It was probably first printed in 1594. It was printed in the First Folio of 1623. ==References== * Henry VI, Pt. 3 Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:Plays based on English history Category:1590s plays
title: Henry VI, Part 3
